name: macOS VM
description: This script creates a macOS Virtual Machine on Proxmox VE using the OpenCore bootloader. It downloads a recovery image directly from Apple, builds a GPT-formatted OpenCore boot disk with all required kexts and drivers, generates a unique SMBIOS identity, and configures the VM with macOS-compatible hardware settings. Supports macOS Sonoma 14, Sequoia 15, and Tahoe 26.

notes.text: Requires Intel CPU with VT-x. AMD may work but is unsupported.
After VM boots, select 'macOS Base System' in OpenCore to begin installation.
Use Disk Utility to erase the SATA disk as APFS before installing macOS.
